Purpose: Immunohistochemical detection of the IDH1 R132H mutation for diagnostic and prognostic assessment of gliomas and other neoplasms.
Container: 10% neutral-buffered formalin container for tissue fixation; sections mounted on positively charged glass slides
Equipment: Microtome, water bath, positively charged glass slides, IHC staining system (including IDH1 R132H antibody kit, DAB chromogen, etc.)
